oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Open Genetic Fall 2012 - Full Text PDF
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Deyholos, Michael
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: OpenGenetics_Fall2012.pdf This is a .pdf file of the Open Genetics textbook. It contains: - cover page - supplementary pages - table of contents - all 13 chapters, with questions - answers to chapter questions are grouped at the end.
